workflow_1_customer_service.name: Customer Service Agent
workflow_1_customer_service.description: Main workflow for handling customer service inquiries

workflow_3_monitoring.name: Continuous Order Monitoring
workflow_3_monitoring.description: Monitor for issues and send alerts

parameters.subject: üö® CRITICAL: {{ $json.notifications.email.subject }}
parameters.html:
=

üö® CRITICAL ORDER ISSUE DETECTED

Alert ID: {{ $json.alert_id }}

Severity: {{ $json.severity.toUpperCase() }}

Confidence: {{ Math.round($json.confidence * 100) }}%

Detection Time: {{ $json.timestamp }}

Issue Description:

{{ $json.issue_description }}

Affected Orders:

{{ $json.affected_orders.length > 0 ? $json.affected_orders.join(', ') : 'Multiple or unknown orders affected' }}

Immediate Actions Required:

  • Review affected orders immediately
  • Contact customers if necessary
  • Coordinate with operations team
  • Update order status as needed

This is an automated alert from the Order Monitoring System.

setup_instructions.description: How to set up and use these n8n workflows

steps.title: Import Workflows
actions: Copy each workflow JSON from above
In n8n interface, click 'Import from JSON'

settings.test_url: curl -X POST http://localhost:5678/webhook/customer-inquiry -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"question": "What is order 12345 status?", "customer_id": 1001}'

slack.setup: Create Slack app and get webhook URL

email.credentials: Add email credentials in n8n settings

test_payload.question: What is the status of my order #12345?
This is urgent! My order is missing and I need it today!

urgent_escalation_test.expected_behavior: Should trigger escalation workflow and Slack notification
